free: #e There is a child called Little Dahu.
#c 有一個小孩，叫小Dahu。
#e He has a dog called Kulu.
#c 他呢，有一隻叫Kulu的狗。
#n kuru ‘black’ < Jap. kuru/kuroi ?? ‘black’
#e They are keeping a frog, which was put inside a bottle.
#c 他們養了一隻青蛙放在瓶子裡面。
#n mapingadah 有一種正要放的感覺，pingadahun則是有放好的感覺 。maipingadah 曾經放過（但現在不見了），piningadah（PF）也是。
#n 比起haipa nii tu 意思更接近肯定一點，很少見的用字。haipa nii tu maimihumisang=dau。nadadu kat misbusuk at pahasia mucingkul。nadadu kat misbusuk*=dau at pahasia mucingkul。

gloss: 使役-在-裡面-受焦=近距.斜格
free: #n mav < mavia
#e When little Dahu is sleeping, the frog he kept is worrying and wondering why he was put inside and where his buddies are.
#c 但是，當那個小Dahu在睡覺，他養的那隻青蛙在著急為何他被鎖在裡面，想知道他的玩伴在哪裡。
#n sun-kaviaz 一起玩。pasunkaivazan < pasunkaviazan
#e He comes out of the bottle and runs away.
#c 他從瓶子出來逃跑了。
#e Until here.
#c 講到這邊。

gloss: 變成-生氣勃勃=改變狀態

free: #e When Little Dahu wakes up early in the morning, he sees that his pet frog is gone. It ran off.
#c 當小Dahu清晨醒來，看到他的小青蛙不見了，他跑掉了。
#e Then he seeks if it is hiding inside his shoes, but it is not.
#c 他找找看牠是不是躲在他的鞋子裡面，可是沒有。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e That Kulu gets his head inside the bottle, smelling and looking for the frog.
#c 那個Kulu把頭放在瓶子裡面，聞聞看青蛙在哪裡。
#e No.
#c 不在。
#e Then with Kulu, together they look for the frog from the window.
#c 然後Kulu他們從窗戶找青蛙。
#e The dog brings the bottle down to the ground.
#c 狗帶著瓶子掉到地上。
#e The bottle breaks.
#c 瓶子破了。
#n tai-pulaz-un 用力撞破

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #n Informant states that ‘nuazhautu’ is the same as ‘maviahautu’
#n nau=hau tu maupa=cia 本來就這樣啊
#n tupa hau tu nii at 就說沒有啊
#n tupa hau tu ung=at 就說是啊
#n informant thinks hau tu 是人在場而且當面質問或責罵，加重Q、驚訝語氣
#e Little Dahu takes Kulu up, blaming it for breaking the bottle.
#c 小Dahu把Kulu抓起來，責怪他為什麼把瓶子弄破。
#e Then the two of them, with his Kulu, go outside and keep on looking for the frog they kept.
#c 然後他們兩個，和他的Kulu，到外面去繼續找所養的青蛙。
#e They keep calling for him. No answers.
#c 他們一直叫他。沒有回音。
#n antalam=ik=su tu uka
#n antalam-un=ku kasu tu uka

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e Then, that Little Dahu, he looks in that hole to check if the little frog went inside it.
#c 然後，那個小Dahu，他檢查那個洞看小青蛙是否在裡面。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e But that Kulu wants to play with the hornets on that tree.
#c 但是Kulu想要和在那棵樹上的虎頭蜂玩耍。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e He is holding onto that tree and shaking it.
#c 他把那個樹搖來搖去。
#e A vole comes out when that Little Dahu is looking for the frog in that hole.
#c 然後當小Dahu在樹洞裡找的時候，一個田鼠出來了。
#n siamas 這裡沒有文法上的意思
#e However, that dog is shaking the hornets powerfully. It keeps on shaking, the hornet’s nest falls down.
#c 但是那個狗在用力搖虎頭蜂窩。他一直搖，虎頭蜂就掉下來。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #n un-daza-un saicia lukis=a
#n un-daza-un saicia *sia lukis=a
#n 這書的 sia < saicia

gloss: 移去-重疊-上面=遠距.斜格
free: #n au < adu
#n 這裡的u- 就是 i-

gloss: 主焦<完成貌>脫逃=遠距.主格
free: #e That Little Dahu climbs on the tree, wondering if the frog ran off onto the tree.
#c 那個小Dahu爬到樹上，看青蛙有沒有逃到樹上。
#n upa < aupa
#n mapuszak 撥開
#n mabuszak 揭開
#n mabulah 弄破洞
#n m-aci-skun 一群一起
#e As for the dog, the nest is dropped down by the dog, and all the hornets spread out, chasing and biting the dog.
#c 狗狗那邊呢，蜂窩被他弄掉了，所有的虎頭蜂散開來追著他咬。
#e Then Little Dahu runs away to hide into the tree.
#c 然後小Dahu逃到樹上藏起來。
#e He grips the tree, keeping on shouting out for the frog he is looking for.
#c 他扶著樹，一直叫那個他找的青蛙。
#e But that place where he is holding the tree, it turns out to be the antlers of a wild deer.
#c 但是他抓的地方原來是野鹿角。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e Suddenly the deer stands up because it was startled.
#c 因為嚇到了，那頭鹿突然站起來。
#n tis = cis
#e He puts Little Dahu on his antlers and runs off toward the river.
#c 他把小Dahu放在角上，往河跑過去。

gloss: 到達-處隔.中距=改變狀態
free: #e Then they get to the river bank.
#c 然後他們就到了河邊。
#e He tosses Little Dahu off, and then kicks that small dog off.
#c 他丟小Dahu，然後也把小狗踢走了。
#e Little Dahu and Kulu drop into the water of the river.
#c 小Dahu和Kulu掉到河水裡面。
#e Then, in the water, Little Dahu takes Kulu up and carries it to the riverbank.
#c 然後在河裡，小Dahu把Kule抓起來，扛到河邊。
#n kuni < ku’uni
#e Little Dahu tells Kulu with a gesture to be quite and not make any noise.
#c 小Dahu用手勢告訴Kulu，讓他安靜不要吵鬧。

gloss: 到達-處格.中距=改變狀態

free: #e Then they arrived at the trees by the shore.
#c 然後他們到達了河邊的樹。
#n ishaiap可能是詞根，但是加上焦點後is卻掉了這樣。空主焦。
#e “Remember, don’t!”
#c “要記得，不要”
#e Ah
#c 啊
#e Little Dahu tells Kulu again with a gesture: “Don’t bark, don’t be noisy, or the hornets will come and bite us!”
#c 小Dahu再一次跟Kulu說：「不要吠，不要吵鬧！不然虎頭蜂會來咬我們。」
#e Then they are resting on the tree.
#c 他們就在樹上休息。
#e Because if they are on the tree, their clothes and the dog will dry quickly.
#c 因為如果他們在樹上，衣服和狗很快就會乾了。
#e However, on the wood they can see the frog, which we are looking for, being together with other frogs.
#c 但是，在木頭上他們能看到那隻我們一直在找的青蛙，正和別的青蛙在一起。

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格
free: #e Then Little Dahu is very happy.
#c 然後小Dahu超高興。
#e His dog, Kulu, is very happy too.
#c 他的狗，Kulu，也很開心。
#e They find the frog, and the frog is taken back by Little Dahu in his hand.
#c 他們找到了青蛙 ，小Dahu把青蛙放在手上帶回去。
#e They leave and go home.
#c 他們離開回家。
#e Ah
#c 啊
#e They take a bow to the frogs being together.
#c 他們對著在一起的青蛙行禮。
#e Thank you!
#c 感謝。
#e Nice to see you.
#c 很高興認識你。
#e See you later.
#c 我們以後再見。
